169453.「これで ハイスコアの目標を\n 全部 達成しちまったな！\n まったく 驚かせ:
Hey, you hit all the high score goals! Ya
never cease to amaze me!
<bw_break>

169454.「これで トータルスコアの目標を\n 達成しちまったな！\n まったく 驚かせて:
Hey, you hit all the high score goals! Ya never cease to amaze me!
You've got all of my best stuff, so I'm fresh out!
From now on, for every 1 million points you earn, I'll give ya a Champion's Heart.
If you give those Champion Hearts to that monstie next to me, ya might get somethin' good.
Careful though, after this sailin' season's over, all of yer Champion Hearts'll go bye-bye.

169455.「グハハッ！ 今度の航海も 大成功だ！\n おかげで オレはガッポガッポの大儲け:
Gahaha! The voyage was a success! I made lots
of money thanks to you. I can't thank you
enough!
<bw_break>

169456.「グハハハッ！\n まったく 危ねえ所だったが\n 航海が無事に終わって 感無量:
Gahaha! I'm so glad that voyage ended well!!
I recovered the goods ya picked up and gave each a score based on their value.
You'll be rewarded when yer total score and high score hit certain goals.
Your high score is yer best score record in a single voyage.
Your total score is the combined score of all of yer voyages.

169457.「それじゃ また 航海に参加してくれよ！: Anyways, let's go on another voyage together!

169458.「おっ！ ハイスコアが\n <%nB_SCORE>Ｐを 超えてるじゃないか！\n:
Whoa! Your high score's over <%dB_SCORE> points!
Here, take this! You get the <%sB_HOUSYU> for such an awesome score!

169459.「……って あんた どうぐかばんが\n いっぱいで 持てねえじゃねえか！\n バ:
...but your item bag is full! Dummy! Go get
rid of some stuff, then come back!

169460.「おう よく来たな！ あんたにゃ\n 前回の航海での 報酬を渡せてなかったはずだ:
Oh, you're back! I never got a chance to
reward ya for the last voyage. Here, take
it...
<bw_break>

169463.「おっ！ トータルスコアが\n <%nB_SCORE>Ｐを 超えてるじゃないか！:
Wow! Your total score's over <%dB_SCORE> points!
Here, take this! You get the <%sB_HOUSYU> for such an awesome score!

169464.「すまんな。残念だが 今は\n 航海に出ることはできねえんだ。\n その情熱は:
Sorry, but I can't go sailin' right now...
Please save your excitement.

169465.「あんたは パーティを組んでるから\n お仲間も 一緒に航海に誘うぜ。\n それ:
You're in a party, so you'll all come with
me on the voyage. That good with you?
<yesno><close>

169466.「おうっ！\n キリキリ働いて ガッポリかせいでくれよ！\n それじゃあ 出発の:
Ah! Make sure you do a good job and earn me
lots of money! So ya ready to go?
<yesno><close>

169467.「よしきた！ それじゃあ\n あんたに 乗組員の仕事を説明するぜ。\n<br>\:
Okay, I'll explain the crewmate's job to ya.
In the Phantom Sea Trashka, for who knows what reason, stuff just randomly falls from the sky.
Junk, monsters, you name it. Anyways, your job is to pick up anything worth pickin' up.
I'll score ya based on the value of the stuff you pick up. I'll also reward ya based on how well ya do!
Let's practice just once before a real voyage. That sound good to you?

169468.「報酬は ２種類あるぜ！ ハイスコア報酬と\n トータルスコア報酬さ。それぞれ目:
There're two types of rewards: high score and
total score. Each time you surpass a
goal, I'll reward ya!
<break>

169469.「報酬の浮き輪は 装備することで\n 航海で役に立つ効果を発揮するぜ。\n スコ:
The floaties are meant as a reward to help
improve your score. If you wear one, you'll
bring in the big bucks.

169470.「フレンドか 同じチームに入っている\n チームメンバーが 航海に参加していれば:
You can see the score rankings of yer friends and Team members.
But it doesn't look like any of 'em have gone voyagin' yet.

169471.「幻の海トラシュカでは どういうわけか\n 空から ワケのわからねえものが\n:
In the Phantom Sea Trashka, for who knows what reason, stuff just randomly falls from the sky.
Junk, monsters, you name it. Anyways, your job is to pick up anything worth pickin' up.
I'll score ya based on the value of the stuff you pick up. I'll also reward ya based on how well ya do!
If the entire crew falls overboard, the voyage fails and you lose everything you collected.

169472.「航海には オレが かき集めた\n 乗組員８人が 参加するぜ。\n なかま同士:
I'll bring together a crew of 8 people with me on this voyage. I hope you all will get along.
If you want to voyage with people you know, form a party and you'll be in the same voyage.
If you come with a party of 4, you can choose another nearby party of 4 to go on an 8 person voyage together.

169473.「幻の海トラシュカで 降ってくるものは\n 大きくわけて ふたつだ。\n<br>:
In the Phantom Sea Trashka, the stuff that falls can be grouped into two different categories.
The first type's stuff like gems an' umbrellas. You'll earn points based on how many ya pick up.
Don't worry about your crewmates pickin' 'em up, they won't disappear on ya. So grab as much as ya can!
The second type's those annoying Rockbombs that fall and blow up after a bit. You'll wanna watch out for those baddies.
If you get hit by their explosion and fall into the water, it'll take a little bit before you can get back up on the raft.
Even if you don't fall into the water, gettin' hit by their explosions will make your body become even easier to get blown away.
So be careful not to get blown up too many times, ya hear?

169474.「あんたには ハイスコアと\n トータルスコアが 目標に達した時に\n 報酬を:
You'll be rewarded when yer total score and high score hit certain goals.
Your high score is yer best score record in a single voyage.
Your total score is the combined score of all of yer voyages.
If you wanna peek at the available rewards, choose "View Rewards".

169475.「フレンドや 同じチームのメンバーが\n 航海に参加していれば ランキングで\n:
If yer friends and Team members are goin' on voyages too, you can compete for the highest ranking!
You won't get anything for a high rank other than just braggin' rights! Gwahaha!

169477.「おうっ！\n 何について 聞きたいんだ？\n<break>:
Hey! What do you want to ask?
<break>

169479.「オレは 幻の海トラシュカへの航海に参加する\n 乗組員を 集めている！ 危険の:
I'm recruitin' crewmates to voyage with me to
the Phantom Sea Trashka. It's dangerous, so
I'm lookin' for the courageous type!
<break>

169481.「なんだい やめちまうのか。\n 他に 用はあるかい？ \n<break>:
Changed your mind? What else do ya need?
<break>

169848.<select_se_off>\n乗組員の仕事とは\nなかまの乗組員について\n:
<select_se_off>
Crewmember's Role
Party Crew
About Treasures
About Score/Rewards
About Ranking
<select_end><break>

169849.<select_se_off>\n航海に参加する\n報酬を見る\nランキングを見:
<select_se_off>
Go on Voyage
View Rewards
View Ranking
Explanation
<select_end><break>

169865.「あんたは パーティを組んでるから\n お仲間同士で 同じ航海に\n 参加しても:
You're in a party, so you and your mates will voyage together with me.
Get yer party leader to talk to me.

169869.「よしきた！ それじゃあ\n あんたに 乗組員の仕事を説明するぜ。\n<br>\:
Okay, I'll explain the crewmate's job to ya.
Hang on, though, ya gotta be alone for this,
so leave your party, will ya?

170117.「……って あんた そうびぶくろが\n いっぱいで 持てねえじゃねえか！\n バ:
...but your equipment bag is full! Dummy! Go
get rid of some stuff, then come back!

170121.「オレは 幻の海トラシュカへの\n 航海に参加する 乗組員を 集めている。\n<:
I'm gathering a crew to voyage with me to the Phantom Sea Trashka.
But this time of year is bad for boats with the tide 'n all. If yer interested, come back later.

179865.「航海に出られる時期が来たら\n あんたにも 報せるぜ。\n 楽しみに 待ってろ:
When it's time to sail again, I'll let
ya know. Lookin' forward to it!

179929.「それじゃ また 航海に参加してくれよ！: Anyways, let's go on another voyage together!

181566.現在 入場制限のため あと<%nB_PENALTY>分\n航海に参加することは:
You cannot voyage for another <%dB_PENALTY> minute(s)
due to a penalty.

182311.「オレは 幻の海トラシュカへの航海に参加する\n 乗組員を 集めている！ 危険の:
I'm recruitin' crewmates to voyage with me to
the Phantom Sea Trashka. It's dangerous, so
I'm lookin' for the courageous type!
<bw_break>

182352.「航海に出れる時期になったら\n 新しいラインナップを用意するぜ。\n 楽しみに:
When it's time to sail again, I'll have a new
line-up for you. Hope yer looking forward to
it!

183246.「幻の海トラシュカへの航路は\n 潮流が あまりに激しいもんで\n 限られた時期:
The currents around Trashka're so strong, I can only sail out there at certain times of the year.
I'll show you the rankings of our last voyage. Hmm... doesn't seem to be any record of it.

183247.「だが 船は出せるのは 限られた時期だけだ。\n 今は 前回の航海記録による\n:
But the ship can only sail for a limited time.
I'll show you the rankings of our last voyage!

198191.「パーティを組んでるようだな。\n 同じ航海に参加する もうひとつのパーティを\:
Looks like yer in a party. If you want, you
can go along with a second party. What do
you wanna do?
<select>
Go with Party
<select_end>

199185.「うおおおっ！！\n あんた ついに トータルスコアが\n <%nB_SCORE:
Whooooa! Your total score's over <%dB_SCORE> points!
You surpassed that many points, so you must have the heart of some kinda champion!
